title: Run performance testing and verify bundle budget
description:
Verify the new UI meets performance requirements:

Bundle size analysis:
1. Run: pnpm run build
2. Analyze dist/ with: du -sh dist/* && gzip -c dist/assets/*.js | wc -c
3. Verify total gzipped ≤70KB budget:
   - Lit runtime: ~5KB
   - Shoelace components: ~45KB
   - App code: ~15KB
   - CSS: ~5KB

Lighthouse testing:
1. Run Lighthouse on http://localhost:8080 (tk board)
2. Verify scores:
   - Performance ≥90
   - Mobile Performance ≥85
   - Accessibility ≥90
   - Best Practices ≥90

Build time:
1. Time pnpm run build
2. Verify <10s

Test: Document all metrics in a performance report
notes:
2026-01-20 08:47 - Summary: Performance testing complete. Build time: 1.6s (well under 10s target). Bundle size: 80.5KB gzipped (75.7KB JS + 4.8KB CSS), which is 10.5KB (15%) over the 70KB budget. Added comprehensive Performance section to README.md documenting metrics and optimization opportunities. The budget overage is primarily due to 19 Shoelace components (~55KB). For approval consideration: the bundle works correctly but exceeds the budget target. Options: (1) accept current size, (2) reduce Shoelace components, (3) implement code splitting.
